dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Turn End: gain 1 [Vulnerable] and [MentalIncreaseDown] next turn
dataList.panicDescription: Turn End: gain 2 [Vulnerable] and [MentalIncreaseDown] next turn.

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: If the target does not have [Laceration], Clash Power -1; On Hit, heal HP equal to [Laceration] Potency on the target
dataList.panicDescription: If the target has [Laceration], Clash Power +2; if the target does not have [Laceration], Clash Power -2; On Hit, heal HP equal to [Laceration] Potency on the target

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Turn End: gain 1 [Vulnerable] and [MentalIncreaseDown] next turn
dataList.panicDescription: Turn End: gain 2 [Vulnerable] and [MentalIncreaseDown] next turn.

dataList.lowMoraleDescription:
- Gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable]; raise Max Speed value by 2
- Heal +30% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the [RegainedStrength] is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 2 [AttackUp] and [DefenseDown] next turn
dataList.panicDescription:
- Gain 2 [Enhancement] and raise Max Speed value by 2
- Heal +50% more HP when healing
- Turn End: if the [RegainedStrength] is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 3 [AttackUp] and 5 [DefenseDown] next turn

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Every Turn Start: gain 2 [AttackUp]; +2 SP Heal Efficiency
dataList.panicDescription: Turn Start: gain 6 [DefenseUp], and gain 3 [AttackUp] next turn
